summary: This is a confidential note from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 10, 2019, describing a visit with inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) on the previous Thursday. The note states Epstein was in good mental state, denied suicidal thoughts, made various requests, and was preparing to meet with his attorneys.

events.title: SHU Visit with Epstein
events.description: An Associate Warden visited inmate Jeffrey Epstein in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York. Epstein was preparing to meet with his attorneys, had a cell mate, made several requests (social calls without speaker phone, retrieval of a book), and denied any suicidal thoughts or mental health concerns.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was housed in the Special Housing Unit (SHU) at MCC New York as of a Thursday in early August 2019.
During a visit by an Associate Warden, Epstein explicitly denied any suicidal thoughts or intentions and showed no signs of distress, anxiety, or depression.
Epstein was actively working on his legal situation and was preparing to meet with his attorneys on the day of the visit.
The document is a confidential administrative note created on August 10, 2019, documenting an earlier visit, and is part of the SDNY evidence set (SDNY_00009499).
